Text.Page:
We're taking the fight to the enemy. Hit the Pirate Grotto and take down those corsairs.

Focus your efforts on the {@LinkCreature:11#2003#Red Lash sentinels}, {@LinkCreature:11#1008#pirates}, {@LinkCreature:11#2001#mates}, {@LinkCreature:11#1003#veterans}, and {@LinkCreature:11#3006#berserkers}.

Report to Beila when mission is complete.

Well done, . Keep up the good work.

Victory for Valkyon!
I'll reward you if you bring me the tokens.
